abstract: Veoh Networks, the Internet video site whose investors include the former chief of Disney, Michael Eisner, has won the backing of two more big names from the media business: Tom Freston and Jonathan Dolgen, both of whom were once executives at Viacom.
lead_paragraph: Veoh Networks, the Internet video site whose investors include the former chief of Disney, Michael Eisner, has won the backing of two more big names from the media business: Tom Freston and Jonathan Dolgen, both of whom were once executives at Viacom.

headline.main: Former Viacom Executives Invest in Veoh
